intro: The ultimate badass time thief strategy hits Nintendo Switch™! Massive sci-fi space warfare through killer warship and combat unit upgrades and customization!
description:
Blast off into the most incredible 4X strategy simulation adventure across the infinite cosmos! Nintendo Switch™'s awesome portability means you can wage totally intense galactic conquest wars anywhere, anytime! Killer comic-style visuals and storytelling created by professional webtoon artists crank up the space warfare atmosphere to the max! Through stunning visual storytelling, each character's amazing interactions and event scenes come to life in vivid detail, satisfying strategy fans and story lovers alike.

Become badass space pirate Kai and master the brutal 4X elements of exploration, expansion, exploitation, and extermination, then conquer the galaxy through totally breathtaking turn-based strategic battles. The killer ship customization system lets you freely equip weapon, energy, and defense modules, while five massive tech research trees satisfy your deepest progression cravings. With intuitive touch controls and smooth gameplay, this thoughtful design ensures fun from strategy simulation newbies to hardcore veterans. Experience strategic thinking and fleet management set against the totally magnificent universe!

・The ultimate essence of badass turn-based 4X strategy simulation!
・Killer ship customization and weapon module equipment systems!
・Massive strategic growth through five technology research trees!
・Three extensive game modes (Story, Classic, Custom) delivering dozens of hours of content!
・Totally diverse strategic elements combining construction, conquest, and combat!
・Continuous growth through killer daily and weekly quests!
・Massively immersive space warfare experience through professional webtoon comic direction!

Experience strategic satisfaction so totally addictive it's earned the "time thief game" reputation! Perfect for badass gamers seeking authentic strategy simulation, sci-fi space universe enthusiasts, and tactical minds who want to craft killer strategies even on the go—Star Titans Galaxy Wars delivers the ultimate galactic conquest journey.

Prologue
In the year 3020, humanity faced a totally unprecedented crisis of massive proportions. Devastating shockwaves from a killer supernova explosion transformed our sun into a red giant, spelling doom for the entire solar system including Earth. In this desperate situation, humanity executed the most badass plan in history, betting their final hope on a totally audacious project. Compressed solar energy was systematically distributed and loaded aboard massive spacecraft called Star Titans, launching humanity on an endless voyage of exile toward distant galaxies.

However, hundreds of migration fleets sharing identical advanced scientific technology were destined to fragment through human selfishness and totally unchecked ambition. Ultimately, humanity split into three killer mega-factions. The Union—a massive coalition force where the most fleets united; Nakal—emphasizing totally aggressive militaristic doctrine and overwhelming firepower; and Mir—a badass intellectual collective renowned for revolutionary technological supremacy. These three powerful factions, each championing vastly different ideologies and goals, began totally fierce territorial conflicts over galactic hegemony in their prospective new homeland. The path to peaceful coexistence was already sealed shut, as humanity's ultimate space war—"The Great Cataclysm"—was about to explode into massive action.

Against this backdrop of cosmic chaos, protagonist Kai's Star Titans vessel, roaming the galaxy as a totally legendary space pirate, materializes in the Proxima star system. His pivotal choices will determine humanity's ultimate destiny and decide the galaxy's fate forever. Can this badass pirate crush the brutal power struggles between these three killer factions and bring new hope to humanity's future? The most incredible saga of massive space warfare and galactic conquest begins right now.
